Module SmartHomeController
Package com.smarthome

Class ThermoSetX19

java.lang.Object
com.smarthome.ThermoSetX19
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vendor.ThermostatInterface
public class ThermoSetX19 extends Object implements com.vendor.ThermostatInterface
The ThermoSetX19 class implements the ThermostatInterface. It represents a thermostat that allows setting and retrieving the desired temperature.
